Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Okay I need to come up with a list of open ended questions to ask the interviewee about their property onboarding process The user wants me to focus on clarifying details decision criteria roles timing sequencing and how exceptions are handled

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Let me start by going through the process step by step as described

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: First the process starts with the landlord contacting the regional office The coordinator checks the documents So maybe ask about what specific criteria they use to determine if documents are missing or outdated Also how do they handle cases where the landlord cant provide certain documents quickly

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Next when assigning a property manager there are factors like workload geographic specialization etc I should ask about the criteria prioritization here Like if workload is heavy but a manager is specialized which takes priority

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Then theres the inspection part If issues are found how does the process adjust Are there specific timelines for repairs Also who is responsible if the landlord refuses to make necessary repairs

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Marketing and pricing How do they set the price range Is it based on market data competition or other factors Maybe ask about how they balance the landlords expectations with market trends

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Tenant screening What are the specific criteria they use to evaluate applicants Are there any exceptions where they might accept someone with lower credit scores

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Exceptions handling The prompt mentions special cases like custom lease clauses or insurance How common are these exceptions and whats the process to handle them Are there any standard protocols

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Roles and responsibilities The compliance officer and financial analyst roles are mentioned How do they interact with the property manager Are there handoffs or collaborative processes

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Timing and sequencing Are there any time constraints at each stage For example how long do they have to get documents updated before moving forward

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Communication and tracking They use emails CRMs and project tools Which tools specifically How do they ensure all parties are aligned especially in case of delays

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Quality checks and audits Who oversees these checks Are there any automated systems or is it all manual What happens if an audit finds a discrepancy

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Also in the onboarding process after activation how is the transition to the property managers ongoing responsibilities handled Is there a handover process from the coordinator to the manager

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I need to make sure the questions are open ended so they cant be answered with yes no Avoid leading questions Maybe ask for examples of exceptions theyve encountered and how they were resolved

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Another point when multiple tenants are interested how do they decide between them Is it first come first served or based on certain priorities

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Also the IT department checks the online listing What specific checks do they perform to ensure data integrity

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Wait the user mentioned not to ask about SQL or implementation details but the questions can ask about the conceptual aspects So instead of asking about the database structure ask about the criteria for data entry accuracy

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Hmm maybe also about the intro call between manager and landlord What are the key topics covered in that meeting to align expectations

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: When the photographer and inspector are scheduled are there any prerequisites they need to meet before they can perform their tasks Like does the property need to be cleaned first

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: In the tenant screening how do they handle cases where there are conflicts between the landlords preferences and fair housing laws Like if the landlord wants to exclude certain groups but thats illegal

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Also how often are the compliance and financial audits conducted Are they done at each step or at the end

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Maybe ask about the most common bottlenecks in the process and how they handle them

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: I should structure these thoughts into coherent questions without repeating any Let me list them out now making sure each is open ended and targets the areas mentioned
